channel.title: Revenge? lool
channel.description: This guy is getting on my server and making himself owner somehow.. cheat client maybe? but he's spawning items and handing them out and advertising his server and ip banning ppl then when he's done he crashes the server.. anyone know how he is doing this and how to stop it? his name is " 1 3 3 7" with the 4 spaces at beginning.. i checked his ip and it says its 0.0.0.0? His server is soulsplit source and so is mine.. anyone know a cheat client to use to do this so i can do the same to his server so maybe he will leave me alone?

item.title: Revenge? lool
item.dc:creator: @jessie_thompson jessie thompson
item.description:
@jessie_thompson wrote:

sorry i cant help your question but can you help me get my server up and running it doesnt seem to want to work i port fowarded and everything i just dont know why anyone cant log into it and noone replyed on my post so.

Read full topic
